 boolean Row.beforeInsert(ConnectionContext cc, DmlStatement dml)
          This method is executed immediately prior to an insert action on this row and returns true if the insert that is about to be performed on this row should be allowed.
 boolean Row.beforeUpdate(ConnectionContext cc, DmlStatement dml)
          This method is executed immediately prior to an update action on this row and returns true if the insert that is about to be performed on this row should be allowed.
 boolean Row.beforeDelete(ConnectionContext cc, DmlStatement dml)
          This method is executed immediately prior to a delete action on this row and true if the insert that is about to be performed on this row should be allowed.
